Free Gift when you spend £55 on selected Clinique - online only, whilst stocks last
Clinique 6-Piece Beauty Gift Set Gift With Purchase

A first-ever serum from our most-loved Moisture Surge. Formulated with powerful actives, this glow serum exfoliates, hydrates, and brightens the look of skin for an instant and continuous glow.Dermatologist tested. Safe for sensitive skin. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.ConcernDry SkinBenefitsExfoliates, hydrates, brightensSkin TypesAllDetailsPowerful ways to glowExfoliates: Helps promote skin’s natural surface cell turnover to reveal fresher-looking, smoother-feeling skin. Exfoliation is known to help other ingredients absorb more easily.Hydrates: Plumps up skin with hydration.Brightens: Helps boost skin’s glow.Lightweight, milky textureThis refreshing, hydrating serum sinks right into skin. Layers well with moisturiser and under makeup.Results100% had a boost in skin radiance.*97% show an instant boost in hydration.*93% say skin feels smoother.**93% say the product is gentle and non-irritating.***91% agree this product pairs well with my moisturizer.*****Testing on 31 women after using the product once.**Consumer testing on 165 women after 2 weeks of product use.***Consumer testing on 165 women after 1 week of product use.****Consumer testing on 105 women after 2 weeks of product use.Key Ingredients5% lactic acidHelps exfoliate dulling dead skin cells, helping actives to better sink in.Hyaluronic acidThis hyaluronic acid serum is moisture-binding ingredient helps infuse skin with plumping hydration.Vitamin CThis vitamin C serum helps brighten the look of skin.Formula FactsDermatologist testedSafe for sensitive skinTested on all skin tonesAllergy testedFragrance freeNon-comedogenicFree OfFragranceOilSodium lauryl sulfateSodium laureth sulfateDrying alcohol
How To UseUse morning and night on clean skin. Start with 3 drops, adding more if preferred.Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.
